params:
ctx
left
top
width
height
radius

6.text:
x1 = left + radius
right2 = left + width
x2 = right2 - radius
y1 = top + radius
bottom2 = top + height
y2 = bottom2 - radius

5.text:
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(
    x1,
    y1,
    radius,
    Math.PI * 1.0,
    Math.PI * 1.5
)
ctx.lineTo(x2, top)
ctx.arc(
    x2,
    y1,
    radius,
    Math.PI * 1.5,
    Math.PI * 0.0
)
ctx.lineTo(right2, y2)
ctx.arc(
    x2,
    y2,
    radius,
    Math.PI * 0.0,
    Math.PI * 0.5
)
ctx.lineTo(x1, bottom2)
ctx.arc(
    x1,
    y2,
    radius,
    Math.PI * 0.5,
    Math.PI * 1.0
)
ctx.closePath()

name: roundedRect
